programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: The advancement of medical technology improves the quality of life and health through innovative diagnoses and treatments.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Although the abduction incident has again set a new ratings record, Ying-fei still does not ask Wai-sum to stay.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Lau Yim goes to the fire scene alone to take first-hand pictures.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Although the industrial building inferno is extinguished, public debate is getting more and more feverish.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Ka-yin’s suspicion is aroused as sees the king of jewelers outside the fire damaged industrial building, so she teams up with Lau Yim to investigate.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Lau Yim’s hair changes from long to short in the duration of a commercial break.

programme.title: Vanishing Days
programme.desc: In the muggy summer of 2009, reality and memory are tangled together, and water from the canal soaked everyone in those vanishing days.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Three foreign friends share their stories about China capturing the heartwarming, stirring and memorable moments they experienced, as well as the significant lessons for future generations.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li, a creative director at a beauty company, is a strong-willed career woman with a vulnerable side. One day, her boss unexpectedly decides to engage a young Internet celebrity to compete with her. Lin Li is then dealt with another blow when she discovers that her husband Chen Shi is having an extramarital affair.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li's daughter Si Yuan finds out that her father is having an affair with tutor Yu Ting. Unable to forgive her father, Si Yuan wrecks Yu Ting's laptop. Lin Li presses Chen Shi about his affair and he insists that their marriage has long had problems. Lin Li goes to the playground where Dong Sheng recognises her as the big sister who helped him when he was a kid.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Si Yuan runs away from home, seeking refuge at fellow netizen Dong Sheng's friend's home. Chen Shi and Lin Li go to places frequented by Si Yuan but canít find her. Chen Shi recalls that Si Yuan actively participates in a group that investigates the paranormal and thinks she may be with them. Lin Li is furious that Chen Shi secretly allowed Si Yuan to make friends online.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Chen Shi recalls the promises he made to Lin Li when he proposed to her and decides to break up with Yu Ting but when he sees her vulnerable side, he can't bear to continue. Chen Shi plans to broach the subject of divorce to Lin Li but she tells him that she wants to salvage their marriage; Chen Shi is caught in a dilemma.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Si Yuan tries to help her parents reconcile; Chen Shi accommodates but continues to think of Yu Ting and secretly keeps in touch with her. After dinner, Chen Shi makes up an excuse to look for Yu Ting and Lin Li is heartbroken. Dong Sheng feels heartache over Lin Li's predicament and decides to protect her.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Ellen Eliasoph, a trailblazing Hollywood independent producer and long-time catalyst for China–U.S. film collaboration, unpacks the success of Nezha and explores China’s growing storytelling influence in global film markets.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie is investigated for the letter she transcribed for Bai Mu Lin who denies having anything to do with it. She is then offered the opportunity to confess her father's crimes, but she stands by her principles and refuses.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: The more Shi Qiang learns about Ye Wen Jie, the more suspicous he gets. Wang Miao re-enters the Three-Body game where everything has changed pointing to changes in civilization, but the goal of predicting the patterns of solar changes is the same.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Mu Xing decisively locks in on several key words said by Pan Han and believes there is a powerful organization behind him. Another scientist in Europe dies. Wang Miao asks Ye Wen Jie for advice again, and she calmly continues to tell him her story.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie discovers a potential fault while performing equipment maintenance. Her talents are noticed by General Director Lei Zhi Cheng and wants to transfer her to the core department of the Hong'an Project, but is strongly opposed by Yang Wei Ning.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao plays a game with his daughter which inspires him to re-enter the Three-Body game with a new understanding of how to unlock the next level. Mu Xing once again boldly contacts Shen Yufei and decides it's time for her to make a choice.

programme.title: Fly with the Crane
programme.desc: 73 year old Ma and his good mate Cao are coffin makers, but ever since the Chinese government started to strongly promote cremation, fewer and fewer people come to the old men for coffins, therefore Ma spend his days hanging out with his grandchildren.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle learns to make Rolling Donkey, a royal dessert, from Chef Tian at Bistro Na's, the only Chinese restaurant in LA to receive a Michilin star in 2019.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Get an inside look into the 9th China-US Cultural and Entertainment Summit, listen to the story of Xu Zheng filming "Dying to Survive", and hit an awards dinner with Hollywood celebrities.
